issue.title: [Developer] Provide means to "plug in" a third party Arrow implementation into the integration test suite for validation purposes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-6571](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6571). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Our current integration test suite has the details of our reference implementations hard coded. If a third party implements integration tests for their Arrow library, we should provide a way for them to test their library against one or more reference implementations

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-6571?focusedCommentId=17287798) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Someone is free to contribute this, but I don't think it's a priority for the community
